channel.title: How can i make it so when you kill an npc it gives experience for a certain skil
channel.description: Well title says it all....But let me restate. Well I'm creating the skill Dungeoneering and am almost done with it, all I need is to make an npc give you experience points after you kill it. So if you could tell me that would be great thanks!!!

item.title: How can i make it so when you kill an npc it gives experience for a certain skil
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“SGTCannon, post:2, topic:384627”]Here is the code:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1626) { temp.addSkillXP(3600, 18); }

1626 = npc you choose
3600 = experience
18 = level (18 is slayer)[/quote]
Thanks man, if I could rep i definately would! Btw i put this in npchander (: it worked ha

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make it so when you kill an npc it gives experience for a certain skil

item.title: How can i make it so when you kill an npc it gives experience for a certain skil
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

Here is the code:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1626) { temp.addSkillXP(3600, 18); }

1626 = npc you choose
3600 = experience
18 = level (18 is slayer)
